word:
MR No. 432 - Dealing With Children

     Parents, as you deal with your children, remember that you are dealing with a reproduction of yourselves. Therefore be sure to examine yourselves, to see whether you are indeed transformed in word and spirit.--Ms 79, 1901, p. 7. ("Testimony to the Parents of the Los Angeles Church," August 18, 1901.) 

Released May 23, 1975.
